title: Why is MVC is so important
body: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Contoller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
body: There is a difference between authentication and authorization.Authenctication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorization menas being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
body: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!
